meanings.definition: The state or quality of being frizzy.
meanings.sent1: Her hair's frizzinesses made it difficult to manage.
meanings.sent2: I used a special shampoo to control the frizzinesses of my hair.
meanings.sent3: The frizzinesses of her hair seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The frizzinesses of the wool sweater resembled a wild forest.
meanings.sent5: The frizzinesses of the fabric felt like a soft cloud.

meanings.sent1: Despite the rain, her hair's frizzinesses persisted.
meanings.sent2: My sister's hair has a natural frizzinesses that I envy.
meanings.sent3: The frizzinesses of the dog's fur seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent4: The frizzinesses of the plant's leaves reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The frizzinesses of the paintbrush strokes added texture to the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The frizzinesses of her hair gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: I tried different products to reduce the frizzinesses of my hair.
meanings.sent3: The frizzinesses of the clown's wig added to his comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: The frizzinesses of the clouds made the sky look dramatic.
meanings.sent5: The frizzinesses of the fabric created an interesting pattern.
